column4: Tweaking windows is a lot more arcane than Linux, the windows registry is a mess

The entire windows organization is a blasphemy.. in linux, from the folder you can already see what contents it will havge.. in linux, drivers and images and libraries are all mixed, its one huge pile..
not to mention the directies called 23LK-J42-K3J4-L2KJ-34LK-J234-LKJ2-K3L4
